title: Railways, roads and highways sector to get the largest chunk of investment in Modi 2.0
selftext:
The devil is in the details. Major emphasis is on new roads and highways, with most of the railways investment going into metros and dedicated freight corridors. 
Basically Modi 2.0 is about ignoring the poor and underserved people in all ways and means possible while claiming massive growth. Growth which favours big companies by lowering their logistics costs while travel costs for common people keep increasing massively
